remarks.para: Any or all may be inoperative provided associated valve is verified open before each departure.

placard.para: Placard affected light "LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The repetitive inspection required when this item is inoperative must be documented in the Aircraft Logbook at the prescribed intervals. (Refer to GMM, Chapter 3, Section 6.)

maintenance.para: Assuring that the related Flight control shutoff valve is open when dispatching with inoperative FLIGHT CONTROL SHUTOFF OFF light(s) requires selective checking of flight control movement.

warning.para: ENSURE PERSONNEL AND EQUIPMENT ARE CLEAR OF ALL CONTROL SURFACES TO PREVENT INJURY OR DAMAGE.

numlitem.para: Establish communications between the flight deck and a ground observer. (EICAS control surface position may also be used.)

para.emphasis: Pressurize only the hydraulic system that has the inoperative FLT CONTROL SHUTOFF light.

numlitem.para: When testing verify that there is no abnormal lag between column and elevator motion.
